info.name: Amori Feedback API
info.description: Feedback, bug reports, and feature request endpoints for Amori API. Submit feedback anonymously or as authenticated user, and manage feedback entries (admin).

item.name: Public

body.raw:
{
  "type": "bug_report",
  "subject": "App crashes on login",
  "message": "The app crashes every time I try to login with my email. This started happening after the latest update.",
  "contact_email": "user@example.com",
  "priority": "high",
  "device_info": "iPhone 15 Pro, iOS 17.1",
  "app_version": "1.2.0"
}

request.description:
Submit a bug report anonymously (no authentication required).

**Required Fields:**
- `type`: bug_report, feedback, or feature_request
- `subject`: Brief subject (max 200 chars)
- `message`: Detailed description (min 10, max 5000 chars)

**Optional Fields:**
- `contact_email`: Email for follow-up
- `priority`: low, medium, high, critical
- `screenshot_url`: Link to screenshot
- `device_info`: Device/browser info
- `app_version`: App version

Submit a feature request anonymously (no authentication required).

**Feedback Types:**
- `bug_report`: Report a bug or issue
- `feedback`: General feedback
- `feature_request`: Request a new feature

Submit general feedback anonymously (no authentication required).

**Optional Fields:**
- `user_name`: Display name (for anonymous users)

item.description: Public endpoints for submitting feedback without authentication.

request.description:
Submit feedback as an authenticated user. User info is automatically attached.

**Required Fields:**
- `type`: bug_report, feedback, or feature_request
- `subject`: Brief subject (max 200 chars)
- `message`: Detailed description (min 10, max 5000 chars)

**Optional Fields:**
- `contact_email`: Email for follow-up (defaults to user's email)
- `priority`: low, medium, high, critical
- `screenshot_url`: Link to screenshot
- `device_info`: Device/browser info
- `app_version`: App version
Get all feedback submissions made by the current authenticated user.

item.description: Authenticated user endpoints for submitting and viewing own feedback.

item.name: Admin

query.description: Filter by status (open, in_progress, resolved, closed)
Filter by priority (low, medium, high, critical)

request.description:
Get all feedback entries with optional filters.

**Optional Query Parameters:**
- `type`: Filter by type (bug_report, feedback, feature_request)
- `status`: Filter by status (open, in_progress, resolved, closed)
- `priority`: Filter by priority (low, medium, high, critical)

Get aggregated feedback statistics.

**Response includes:**
- `total`: Total feedback count
- `byType`: Count by type (bug_report, feedback, feature_request)
- `byStatus`: Count by status (open, in_progress, resolved, closed)
- `byPriority`: Count by priority (low, medium, high, critical)

Get a specific feedback entry by ID.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: Feedback UUID

Update feedback status, priority, or add admin notes.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: Feedback UUID

**Optional Body Fields:**
- `status`: open, in_progress, resolved, closed
- `priority`: low, medium, high, critical
- `admin_notes`: Internal notes for support team (max 2000 chars)
Mark a feedback entry as resolved. The `resolved_at` timestamp is automatically set.

Update feedback priority.

**Priority Levels:**
- `low`: Nice to have, no urgency
- `medium`: Should be addressed (default)
- `high`: Important, affects user experience
- `critical`: Urgent, system-breaking issue

Delete a feedback entry.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: Feedback UUID

**Returns:** 204 No Content on success

item.description: Admin endpoints for managing all feedback entries.
